name: DUCK Mission
description:
DUCK Mission is a 2D platform game, your dimension is in danger of extinction! Hurry up to get back all the energy crystals stolen by evil enemies and return in full after the ordeal in this hardcore platformer! Jump on the platforms, avoid traps, gaps and well-aimed shots of enemies to save your dimension and all life!

Features:
- Nice graphics from gentuni65
- Nice soundtrack ROBINSON PIXEL
